::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc calmly approaches his three training bots, his sword ready. 
They leap at him, Havoc ducking under and smashing his elbow into the 
back of one.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor runs at his training bots, gun blazing and leaving chunks 
of metal to fly everywhere.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> "No problem."
> He runs at the three practice bots, doing several moves. Soob 
chunks of
> the bots are flying across the room.
